Question: Altec Lansing / AL Infinity CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Altec Lansing

Product: Hydra 2.0 Series

- Versatile and durable speakers with "EVERYTHINGPROOF" technology
- Features mount it, clip it, stick it, or wear it capabilities
- Floats in water, resists damage from sand and dust
- Offers Qi wireless charging while playing music
- Built-in 6-degree pedestal for optimal audio dispersion
- Party Sync for coupling over 100 speakers
- Refreshed look with new logo, grill/plating, and vibrant colors

Party Speakers and DJ Equipment

- New line of DJ equipment and bass pumping party speakers
- All-in-one projector with integrated speakers for indoor and outdoor entertainment

Kids Headphones Line

- Upgraded features for kid-friendly audio line
- True wireless earbuds with secure 85dB limit, 30 hours of playtime, and built-in tracker

High-Performance Headphones

- TWS headphones and earbuds with super slim charging case and open ear concept
- New line of earbuds, Hydrabud Series, with water and sweatproof capabilities and active noise cancelling
- Upgraded over-the-ear headphones with foldable on-the-go design and active noise cancellation

Hi-Fi Equipment

- New innovative technology promising high-quality, affordable sound with seamless streaming app pairing
- Delivering a life-like concert experience at home
Summary_cn:
奥图恩

产品：Hydra 2.0 系列

- 多功能耐用音箱，采用“EVERYTHINGPROOF”技术
- 具备各种安装方式：安装、夹子、贴面或佩戴
- 在水中浮动，防止沙尘损坏
- 通过无线充电提供音乐播放功能
- 内置6度底座，实现最佳音频散射
- Party Sync 功能，最多可连接100多个音箱
- 具备更新的外观，新的标志、网罩/饰面以及鲜艳的颜色

派对音箱和DJ设备

- 新系列DJ设备和低音动感派对音箱
- 全功能投影仪，内置音箱，支持室内外娱乐

儿童耳机系列

- 升级版适合儿童使用的音频产品线
- 真无线耳机，限制音量至85dB，续航时间30小时，并带有内置追踪功能

高性能耳机

- 超薄充电壳和开放式概念的 TWS 耳机和耳塞
- 新系列耳塞，Hydrabud 系列，具备防水防汗功能和主动降噪
- 升级版折叠式便携耳机，支持主动降噪

高保真音响设备

- 创新技术，提供高品质、实惠的音质和无缝流媒体应用连接
- 在家享受逼真的音乐会体验
